title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing team and help build scalable backend systems.
description: As a Senior Software Engineer, you will design and implement high-performance APIs, mentor junior developers, and drive technical decisions for our core platform.
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable RESTful APIs and microservices
Lead code reviews and mentor junior engineers
Collaborate with product and design teams on feature specifications
Optimize database queries and system performance
Participate in on-call rotation and incident response

required: Strong proficiency in Python or Go
Experience with PostgreSQL or similar databases
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent

technical: Describe how you would design a rate-limiting system for an API.
How do you approach database query optimization?
Explain your experience with microservices architecture.
behavioral: Tell me about a time you mentored a junior developer.
Describe a situation where you had to push back on a product requirement.
How do you handle disagreements during code reviews?
situational: How would you handle a production incident at 2 AM?
A feature you designed is causing performance issues. What do you do?

title: Product Manager
summary: Join our product team to drive the roadmap for our AI-powered hiring platform.
description: As a Product Manager, you will own the end-to-end product lifecycle, from discovery to launch. You'll work closely with engineering, design, and customers to build features that transform how companies hire.
responsibilities: Define product vision and roadmap aligned with company strategy
Gather and prioritize requirements from customers and stakeholders
Write detailed PRDs and user stories
Analyze product metrics and run A/B experiments
Coordinate cross-functional launches

preferred: Experience in HR Tech or recruiting industry

evaluation_criteria.name: Strategic Thinking
evaluation_criteria.description: Ability to define and execute product vision

technical: How do you prioritize features when resources are limited?
Walk me through how you would analyze a drop in user engagement.
How do you balance technical debt vs new features?
behavioral: Tell me about a product launch that didn't go as planned.
How do you handle conflicting priorities from stakeholders?
Describe a time you had to make a decision with incomplete data.
situational: A key customer requests a feature that conflicts with your roadmap. What do you do?
Engineering says a feature will take 3 months. Sales promised it in 1 month. How do you handle this?

title: UX Designer
summary: We're seeking a talented UX Designer to craft intuitive experiences for our hiring platform.
description: As a UX Designer, you'll lead the design process from research to high-fidelity prototypes. You'll work on complex workflows and make them simple and delightful for recruiters and candidates alike.
responsibilities: Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
Develop and maintain design system components
Collaborate with engineers on implementation
Present design decisions to stakeholders

technical: Walk me through your design process for a recent project.
How do you approach designing for accessibility?
How do you measure the success of your designs?
behavioral: Tell me about a time you received critical feedback on your design.
How do you handle situations where stakeholders disagree with your design?
Describe a project where you had to balance user needs with business constraints.
situational: A developer says your design is too complex to implement. How do you respond?
You have 2 days to design a critical feature. How do you approach it?

title: Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Build the AI/ML systems that power our intelligent hiring platform.
description: As an ML Engineer, you'll develop and deploy machine learning models for resume parsing, candidate matching, and interview analysis. You'll work on cutting-edge NLP and computer vision problems.
responsibilities: Design and implement ML models for NLP and computer vision
Build data pipelines for model training and inference
Deploy models to production with monitoring
Collaborate with product on AI feature development
Research and evaluate new ML techniques

required: Strong Python and ML framework experience (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
Experience with NLP models and transformers
Experience deploying ML models to production
MS/PhD in CS, ML, or related field
preferred: Experience with LLMs and prompt engineering

evaluation_criteria.name: ML Expertise
evaluation_criteria.description: Deep knowledge of ML algorithms and techniques

technical: Explain how you would build a resume parsing system.
How do you handle class imbalance in training data?
Describe your approach to model monitoring in production.
behavioral: Tell me about an ML project that failed and what you learned.
How do you stay current with ML research?
Describe a time you had to simplify a complex ML solution.
situational: A model's performance degrades after deployment. How do you debug it?
Product wants a feature that requires data you don't have. What do you do?
